text: The Art of Thievery
trans: 怪盗的艺术

text: Chat Noir believes the mastermind behind the theft is his former master, who taught him how to be a phantom thief. For the time being, the crew sets out to return the stolen jewels.
trans: 夏诺瓦相信指使这些盗贼的正是教导他成为怪盗的前师傅，不过目前归还被偷走的宝石才是众人的首要目标。

name: Suspicious Man 1/可疑男子1
text: Grr... Who are you people?
trans: 唔……你是谁？

name: Suspicious Man 2/可疑男子2
text: And what are you doing here?
trans: 呃……为什么会在这里？

text: The crew gets the jump on the men and apprehends them before they have a chance to act.
trans: 众人在两人有机会逃跑前逮捕了他们。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: You jerks! Are you the jewel thieves?
trans: 喂！你们就是偷走宝石的混蛋吧！

name: Chat Noir
text: No, these are just lackeys. The real mastermind is somewhere else.
trans: 不，他们两个只是负责跑腿的，真实的幕后黑手另有其人。

name: Chat Noir
text: Now then, I've got a question for you. Who are you working for?
trans: 那么，我有问题问你们，是谁指使你们这么干的。

name: Suspicious Man 1/可疑男子1
text: Look, we were only told to deliver the goods!
trans: 我，我们只是听从命令把宝石拿到这里。

name: Chat Noir
text: Calm yourselves. We don't intend to harm you. That is, of course, if you tell me what I want to know.
trans: 安心吧，我没有伤害你们的理由，当然前提是你们能告诉我问题的答案。

name: Chat Noir
text: And I only want to know one thing: the name of the one pulling the strings.
trans: 我想知道的只有一件事，幕后黑手，你们知道是谁吗？

name: Suspicious Man 2/可疑男子2
text: I don't know anything about the boss! Please, ya gotta believe me!
trans: 关于首领的事情我一点都不知道，你要相信我啊！

name: Chat Noir
text: Humph. I knew it'd be pointless to ask. Our opponent isn't one to be caught so easily.
trans: 哼，果然这样的询问也没有什么作用，那家伙也不是会轻易露出马脚的人。

name: Chat Noir
text: 姬塔, let's depart for now.
trans: 姬塔，现在先离开这里吧。

text: The crew returns to the airship upon Chat Noir's request.
trans: 众人按照夏诺瓦的请求回到了骑空艇上。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: So do you have any idea who this mastermind is?
trans: 所以，夏诺瓦猜到幕后黑手可能是谁了吗？

name: Chat Noir
text: Judging from what I've seen, it's probably the one who taught me how to be a phantom thief.
trans: 这次的事件，应该是教给我怪盗艺术的那个人的手笔。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: You had a teacher, Chat Noir?
trans: 夏诺瓦先生有一个师傅吗？

name: Chat Noir
text: We no longer have ties.
trans: 我们之间已经没有联系了。

text: A rare serious expression crosses his face.
trans: 他的脸上出现了罕见的严肃表情。

name: Chat Noir
text: In any case, we must return these jewels at once.
trans: 比起这个，现在还是归还这些宝石比较重要。

name: Chat Noir
text: Heh heh. It's so easy to slip through security and pilfer these days. Let's go, 姬塔.
trans: 哼，这两个国家这几天的警备守卫力量也太薄弱了，咱们走吧，姬塔。
scene_chr312_q3_s10
